item.title: [317]Trade And General Chat[317]
item.dc:creator: @Evocation Evocation
item.description:
@Evocation wrote:

I know, it’s simple and like ::yell, but i think its very neat.
I’ts just like from world of warcraft, anyhow, you can sell things on ::2 selling whip!
and just talk on ::1 hello!
so go into your commands, and add this:

if (command.startsWith("2") && command.length() > 2) { if(muted){ sM("You are muted and cannot talk"); } else { yell("[TradeChat] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(2)); } } if (command.startsWith("1") && command.length() > 2) { if(muted){ sM("You are muted and cannot talk"); } else { yell("[GeneralChat] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(2)); } }

Read full topic
